resources.string:
v2.2.01-02
 Location Fixes:
 Franklin County, GA
 Erie County, PA
 
 General Fixes:
 Button configuration labels for "MORE INFO" and "CLOSE APP" were swapped.
 
 v2.2.01-01
 Complete rewrite of the settings menu to hopefully make it more logical.
 
 Expanded call detail window to cover entire screen.
 
 v2.1.12-01
 A new version of Cadpage will soon be available as a beta release. If you are interested in trying it out, sign up to be a Cadpage Beta Tester in the Play Store app.
